citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on 16-
FEB-22.
Called and spoke with both Robin and Ron Herd and no one was available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

FEB-22. 
 
Called and spoke with both Robin and Ron Herd and no one was available.
